channel.title: Comments on: Using Razor as an Embedded Report Engine
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Andre
item.dc:creator: Andre
item.description: Did you got any memory leak issues with large resultsets using Razor Engine?
item.content:encoded: Did you got any memory leak issues with large resultsets using Razor Engine?

item.title: By: Dan Meland
item.dc:creator: Dan Meland
item.description:
I am looking at you razor report engine, and wondering if there is an easy way to do sub reports, or embedded reports.
Any thoughts.
Thanks
item.content:encoded:
I am looking at you razor report engine, and wondering if there is an easy way to do sub reports, or embedded reports.

Any thoughts.

Thanks
